Placement Examinations in Calculus and Mathematics for Economics
Students who intend to register for Calculus I (MATH-UA 121) or Mathematics for Economics I (MATH-UA 131; formerly 211) and do not meet any of the prerequisites listed in the mathematics section of this Bulletin must take a placement exam to determine their readiness to enter calculus.
